name: gemini-notion-extension
description: Enhanced Notion integration for Gemini CLI - file uploads, automation, monitoring, plus 38+ comprehensive tools

scripts.bundle: esbuild dist/server.js --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --format=esm --outfile=dist/bundle.js --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);"
scripts.bundle:legacy: esbuild dist/server-legacy.js --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --format=esm --outfile=dist/bundle.js --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);"
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
